sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>(Incidental) Once per round on the character's turn, the character may mount or dismount from a vehicle or beast, or slide into the cockpit or weapon station aboard a starship, as an incidental instead of a maneuver.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Let's Ride</name> <number>TAL0001192</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-10-14 11:27:48</sys_created_on> <sys_id>a45f7f962f3f1490e0f497eef699b61e</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-10-14 11:27:48</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
